meanings.definition: The act of preserving food by sealing it in cans or jars.
meanings.sent1: My grandma taught me the cannings process for storing fruits.
meanings.sent2: We bought some cannings equipment to start preserving our garden produce.

meanings.sent5: The sound of cannings lids popping open filled the kitchen with satisfaction.

meanings.sent1: Cannings require careful attention to prevent contamination.

meanings.sent5: The art of cannings involves timing and technique to ensure freshness.
